page.title: 12LYNNBOTTOM DUMP CHEMICALS
page.content: One of the refuse problems of the island is dangerous chemicals which are washed up on the beach. When this happens specially equipped firemen collect the barrels of chemicals and take them to Lynnbottom dump and put them into a special store. There are two different sheds. The one with the red door has {INFLAMMABLE LIQUIDS}e.g.paraffin. The one with the black door has {POISONOUS CHEMICALS}in it. Only Firemen wearing special moon suits can enter because of the {POISONOUS} {FUMES}. Then these chemicals are transported to Southampton to a firm called {RECHEM INTERNATIONAL}where they can dispose of them.
